statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureCosmosDBTableResource)<-[:CONTAINS]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)

MATCH (:AzureCosmosDBTableResource)<-[r:CONTAINS]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
